project.name: ADM Developer tasks - PACKAGE, DEPLOY Samples
project.description: This buildfile is used to BUILD, PACKAGE and DEPLOY OSCM sample applications.

target.description: Builds the AWS controller project, the result can be found in oscm-build/result/package/oscm-app-aws

target.description: Deploys the AWS build result into the APP domain

target.description: Undeploys the AWS from the APP domain
